name: dokploy
tagline: A self-hosted deployment platform for running apps with Docker
description: Dokploy is a self-hosted platform for deploying applications using a modern web UI. It supports Docker-based deployments, databases, custom domains, SSL, and secrets, aiming to simplify app hosting for individuals and small teams.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Deploy applications from Git repositories with automatic builds and Docker containerization

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Provision and manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis databases with backup automation

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Secure management of application secrets and environment variables with encryption

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Real-time application monitoring with logs, metrics, and health status visualization

features.title: Load Balancing
features.description: Built-in load balancer with health checks and automatic failover for high availability

features.title: Backup System
features.description: Automated database and application backups with configurable retention policies
